summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting a proffer interview of an unnamed female witness conducted via video conference on November 5, 2021. The witness, represented by an attorney, provides Giglio-related background information, including her lack of prior testimony, limited drug use history, and personal background. She discusses her past marriage, immigration history, and a tangential connection to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell via a former husband involved in an 'ocean project'.

persons.name: Unknown Female Witness
persons.context: The unnamed female witness is interviewed under a proffer agreement. She provides background information for Giglio disclosure purposes, discusses her limited prior testimony (a civil deposition related to Epstein), personal history, and a past connection to Epstein and Maxwell through a former husband.

persons.context: Present during the video conference interview of the unnamed female witness, representing her interests.

persons.context: Present during the interview of the witness, presumably from the office prosecuting the Epstein case.

persons.context: Present during the interview of the witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a prior civil deposition the witness gave. The witness also states a former husband was 'involved with EPSTEIN' on an ocean project.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in connection with the witness's former husband, who was possibly connecting with Maxwell on an ocean project related to Epstein.

connections.description: The witness gave a civil deposition related to the Epstein case and had a former husband who was involved with Epstein.
The witness's former husband was possibly connecting with Maxwell on an ocean project related to Epstein.
The attorney was present representing the witness during her proffer interview with law enforcement.
Implied connection through the witness's statement about her former husband being involved with Epstein and possibly connecting with Maxwell.

events.title: Proffer Interview of Witness
events.description: An unnamed female witness is interviewed via video conference pursuant to a proffer agreement. She provides extensive background information for Giglio disclosure purposes.

events.title: Witness's Last Marijuana Use
events.description: The witness states the last time she used marijuana was around 2016-2017 when offered at a party.

events.title: Witness's Civil Deposition in Epstein Case
events.description: The witness states she previously gave a civil deposition related to the Epstein case, with 2-3 lawyers present, and told the truth.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: The document is a Giglio-focused FBI 302 interview of a female witness who had given a prior civil deposition related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The witness reveals a past connection to Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell through a former husband who was 'involved with EPSTEIN and possibly connecting with MAXWELL on an ocean project.'
The witness has no significant criminal history, no prior court testimony besides the Epstein deposition, and minimal past drug use (marijuana twice, and suspected cocaine once from an ex-husband).
The witness discusses her immigration history, including an incident in Washington where she was denied entry due to a visa issue and sent home, which was not considered a deportation.
The witness's identity is fully redacted throughout the document, indicated by the placeholder '0'.
